props.text: Current Week Energy Readings By Day
Last Week Energy Readings By Day

customMethods.name: calculateEnergy
customMethods.script:
tagPath = self.view.params.tagPath + "/EMUData/Totals/Power/Total_TruePower"
	today = system.date.midnight(system.date.now())
	dayOffset = system.date.getDayOfWeek(today)-1
	startOfWeek = system.date.addDays(today, -1*dayOffset)
	startOfLastWeek = system.date.addDays(today, (-1*dayOffset) -7)
	
	self.view.custom['current-week'] =  self.getWeeksData(self.custom.settings, startOfWeek, tagPath)
	self.view.custom['last-week'] =  self.getWeeksData(self.custom.settings, startOfLastWeek, tagPath)

customMethods.name: getData
customMethods.script:
hours = system.date.secondsBetween(startTime, endTime)/3600
	
	data = system.tag.queryTagCalculations(
		paths=[tagPath], 
		calculations=["Average"], 
		startDate=startTime, 
		endDate=endTime
	)
	
	if data.getRowCount() > 0: 
		return (data.getValueAt(0,1)*hours)/1000
	
	return 0

customMethods.name: getTimeSpan
getWeeksData
customMethods.script:
shifts = map(lambda shift: {'name': shift['name'], 'date': self.getTimeSpan(date, shift['start-time'], shift['end-time'], shift['time-select']), 'days': shift['days']}, settings)
	
	data = []
	
	for shift in shifts:
		weeksData = []
	 
		for i in range(len(shift['days'])):
			startTime = system.date.addDays(shift['date']['start'], i)
			endTime = system.date.addDays(shift['date']['end'], i)
			daysData = 0
			
			if shift['days'][i]:
				daysData = self.getData(tagPath, startTime, endTime)
			
			weeksData.append({'start-time': startTime, 'energy': daysData })
		
		data.append({'name': shift['name'], 'data': weeksData})
			
	return data
